text: Challakere Kareem Jaffer Sharief (3 November 1933 â€“ 25 November 2018) was an Indian politician. He was one of the senior most Indian National Congress leaders. He was the Railways Minister of the Government of India from 1991 until 1995 when P. V. Narasimha Rao was Prime Minister. He was a member of Lok Sabha from 1971 to 1996 and again from 1998 to 2004. Sharief died at the age of 85 in Bengaluru from a heart attack on November 25, 2018. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Karnataka Category:People from Bangalore Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: C. K. Jaffer Sharief
